text: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ٱبْيَضَّتْ وُجُوهُهُمْ فَفِى رَحْمَةِ ٱللَّهِ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ

translation.en.sahih: But as for those whose faces will turn white, [they will be] within the mercy of Allah. They will abide therein eternally.
translation.id.indonesian: Adapun orang-orang yang putih berseri mukanya, maka mereka berada dalam rahmat Allah (surga); mereka kekal di dalamnya.
